rules_text:
Each nonland permanent card in your graveyard has decompose into Food. The decompose cost is equal to its mana cost. [i](Pay that card’s decompose cost and exile it from your graveyard: Create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s a colorless Food artifact with “{2}, {T}: Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life,” and it loses all other card types.)[/i]
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Underworld Bread and you gain 3 life.
